title: AA resets are too common
body:
why this is bad

- makes fighters very burst; in an age where fighters have more AD than ever (and CDR) fighters can one combo people very quickly
- AS slowing becomes much much less useful as a debuff because AS resets ignore it; not nearly as big a DPS hit as it used to be (alongside the fact most fighters are casters now)
- lazy filler spell design that gets ignored way too much, even worse than giving people dashes just because you can imo. give me more interesting spells

when will the AA reset spam be solved

replies.body: When thereâ€™s less CDR in the game.

Not sure if this is a satire post about Riot's poor decision to keep 0s cast times on many abilities where it is abused, or if this is a post nitpicking about how paint is peeling off in a house without a roof.

Either way, +1

Yeah, and overloaded AA resets are the worst offenders of the bunch. For example, an AA reset that also provides a MS boost and then CCs the enemy in some way. Any ability like that should just be nerfed into the ground. Right?

the basically removed fighters ability to use attack speed items by making tank items squishy straight up removing some items and making crit items do so much damage that fighters cant build them cause they would insta die before trying to use them themselves. also constant buffs to ap items nerfs to hp armor and magic resist and buffs to penetration items and skills.
